other_tests.findings: The medial first toe was hypoplastic, and only traces of the phalanges with a normal first metatarsal appeared on a radiograph.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Three years after surgery, the surgical scars were inconspicuous and conventional shoes could be worn comfortably. A postoperative radiograph showed favorable growth of the nail plate and phalangeal bone. The metatarsal and distal phalangeal angle improved from â€“94 degrees to 9 degrees.
